    Function reference

    All functions

    child_barometer_data
    Child Barometer 2016 response data
    conllu_cb_bullying
    Child Barometer 2016 Bullying response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_cb_bullying_iso
    Child Barometer 2016 Bullying response data in CoNLL-U format with ISO stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_1
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_dev_q11_1_f
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Female q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_dev_q11_1_f_nltk
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Female q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format with NTLK stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_1_m
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Male q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_dev_q11_1_m_nltk
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Male q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format with NTLK stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_1_na
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Gender Not Specified q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_dev_q11_1_na_nltk
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Gender Not Specified q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format with NTLK stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_1_nltk
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format with NTLK stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_1_snow
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_1 response data in CoNLL-U format with snowball stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_2
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_2 response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_dev_q11_2_nltk
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_2 response data in CoNLL-U format with NTLK stopwords removed
    conllu_dev_q11_3
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_3 response data in CoNLL-U format
    conllu_dev_q11_3_nltk
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 q11_3 response data in CoNLL-U format with NTLK stopwords removed
    dev_data
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 response data
    dev_data_f
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Female response data
    dev_data_m
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Male response data
    dev_data_na
    Young People's Views on Development Cooperation 2012 Gender Not Specified response data
    fst_cn_compare_plot()
    Concept Network- Plot comparison Concept Network
    fst_cn_edges()
    Concept Network - Get textrank edges
    fst_cn_get_unique()
    Concept Network- Get Unique Nodes
    fst_cn_nodes()
    Concept Network - Get textrank nodes
    fst_cn_plot()
    Plot Concept Network
    fst_cn_search()
    Concept Network - Search textrank for concepts
    fst_comparison_cloud()
    Make comparison cloud
    fst_concept_network()
    Concept Network - Make Concept Network plot
    fst_concept_network_compare()
    Concept Network- Compare and plot Concept Network
    fst_find_stopwords()
    Get available Finnish stopwords lists
    fst_format_conllu()
    Annotate open-ended survey responses in Finnish into CoNLL-U format
    fst_freq()
    Find and Plot Top Words
    fst_freq_compare()
    Compare and plot top words
    fst_freq_plot()
    Make Top Words plot
    fst_get_top_ngrams()
    Make Top N-grams Table
    fst_get_top_ngrams2()
    Make Top N-grams Table 2
    fst_get_top_words()
    Make Top Words Table
    fst_get_unique_ngrams()
    Get unique n-grams
    fst_join_unique()
    Merge N-grams table with unique words
    fst_length_compare()
    Compare response lengths
    fst_length_summary()
    Make Length Summary Table
    fst_ngrams()
    Find and Plot Top N-grams
    fst_ngrams_compare()
    Compare and plot top n-grams
    fst_ngrams_compare_plot()
    Plot comparison n-grams
    fst_ngrams_plot()
    Make N-grams plot
    fst_plot_multiple()
    Display comparison plots
    fst_pos()
    Make POS Summary Table
    fst_pos_compare()
    Compare parts-of-speech
    fst_prepare_conllu()
    Read In and format Finnish survey text responses
    fst_rm_stop_punct()
    Remove Finnish stopwords and punctuation from CoNLL-U dataframe
    fst_summarise()
    Make Summary Table
    fst_summarise_compare()
    Make comparison summary
    fst_summarise_short()
    Make Simple Summary Table
    fst_wordcloud()
    Make Wordcloud
